hero_subtitle: Okutendeka abakulembeze b'omu maaso okuyitira mu kuyigiriza okutuukiridde n'empisa ez'obulamu.

intro.text1: Baaniriddwa mu Bugisu High School â€“ Lyatandikibwawo mu 1950, era lye limu ku masomero agasooka amatutumufu mu kitundu.
intro.text2: Lisangibwa ku nsozi za Mt. Elgon, essomero lyaffe ligatta obulombolombo obugagga n'okusoma okw'omulembe n'emizannyo.
intro.text3: Abayizi baffe bafuba mu kusoma, obukulembeze, obuwangwa, n'emizannyo.

about.title: Ebikwata ku Bugisu High
about.text: Bugisu High School kifo ky'okusomeramu ekikutufu ekifuba mu kuyigiriza okw'omulembe n'okukuza abayizi mu ngeri zonna.
